message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000.  It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I believe I can't justify spending $10,000 on it at this time. I would like to propose an offer of $9,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $9,000 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to come down to $9,500. It's a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I understand the value of your product, I'm still hesitant to spend $9,500 on it. I would like to propose an offer of $9,000 again, as I believe that's a fair price for both of us. I hope this proposal is more in line with your expectations.
